description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Space is infested with unicorns.  When scientists discovered this, they realized that the only way to stop them was by combining the two coolest things on the planet:  rockets and narwhals.
description.short: Space is infested with unicorns.  When scientists discovered this, they realized that the only way to stop them was by combining the two coolest things on the planet:  rockets and narwhals.
